body_html:
If you're following the instructions on building TensorFlow from sources, it should tell you that doing so
requires 0.4.5

Bazel versions less than that are not supported.
body_text:
If you're following the instructions on building TensorFlow from sources, it should tell you that doing so
requires 0.4.5
Bazel versions less than that are not supported.
body:
If you're following the instructions on [building TensorFlow from sources](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources), it should tell you that doing so
[requires 0.4.5](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/83be34c47c7ed81c62bd61a908fde017e301b578/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L107)

Bazel versions less than that are not supported.
